summary: This is a legal motion filed by Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team seeking to strike surplusage from the superseding indictment against her. The document identifies her attorneys and the law firms representing her in the criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) who is filing a motion to strike surplusage from the superseding indictment.

persons.name: Mark S. Cohen
persons.context: Attorney from Cohen & Gresser LLP who signed the motion on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Filing of Motion to Strike Surplusage
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team files a motion to strike surplusage from the superseding indictment in her criminal case.

locations: 800 Third Avenue, 21st Floor, New York, NY 10022
33 West 19th Street - 4th Floor, New York, NY 10011
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team filed a motion to strike surplusage from the superseding indictment against her.
The motion was filed on January 25, 2021 in the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York.
Maxwell was represented by multiple law firms including Cohen & Gresser LLP, Haddon, Morgan & Foreman P.C., and the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Stemheim.
The case number is 20 Cr. 330 (AJN), indicating it was filed in 2020.
The document shows Maxwell's legal defense strategy included challenging the wording of the indictment against her.
